name: Simple Farmer
description:
As a simple farmer, you have only two things on your mind: Your crops and invading monsters.

To combat the invading menace, you need to place down some Laser towers. Sell your crops to pay for those towers

How long can you survive?

[WIP Notes]

Since it's in a very early stage of development, there are a few things to add.

You interact with "e", restart the level with "r" and manually spawn Monsters with "t"

Currently, only turrets can be bought.
